about.details:
Incorporated in June 2010, Thai Casting Limited is an automotive ancillary company specializing in High-Pressure Die Casting, as well as the precision Machining of both Ferrous and Non-Ferrous materials and Induction heating and quenching. The company has three business verticals:-

  1. High Pressure Die Casting
  2. Machining of Ferrous and Non-Ferrous
  3. Induction Heating and Quenching

Thaai Casting is an IATF 16949: 2016 certified company.

The company offers a wide range of automotive components, such as engine mounting support brackets, transmission mounts, fork shift and housing, steering wheel armatures, electrical connectors, YFG base frames (both right-hand and left-hand drive side), housing, top cover, and more. The manufacturing unit is located in No Tiruvallur, Tamil Nadu, India,

The company has a die-making facility for new product development according to the required specifications. The die maintenance process is done with utmost care to ensure the dies run continuously and have a longer lifespan.

As of September 30, 2023, the company employs 132 people in various departments.

faqs.question: What is the Thaai Casting IPO?
faqs.answer:
Thaai Casting IPO is a SME IPO of 6129600 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹47.20 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹77 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on February 15, 2024, and closes on February 20, 2024.

Purva Sharegistry India Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Thaai Casting IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Thaai Casting IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Thaai Casting IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Thaai Casting IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Thaai Casting IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Thaai Casting IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Thaai Casting IPO opens on February 15, 2024 and closes on February 20, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Thaai Casting IPO?
faqs.answer: Thaai Casting IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,23,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Thaai Casting IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Thaai Casting IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Thaai Casting IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Thaai Casting IPO will be done on Wednesday, February 21, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, February 22, 2024. Check the Thaai Casting IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Thaai Casting IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Thaai Casting IPO listing date is on Friday, February 23, 2024.
